issue.title: [R] vignette ‘dataset’ not found
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11831](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11831). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```
> vignette("dataset", package = "arrow")
Warning message:
vignette ‘dataset’ not found 
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11831?focusedCommentId=17293149) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Works on my machine with a CRAN installation. Did you build the package without building vignettes?
